start.name: You
sentences: (Awakening, eyes narrowed, calculating) (The voice is icy, hollow) The convention. I remember the speed.

lyra_perfect_smile.name: Lyra
sentences: (Wakes abruptly, staring, relief turning to sheer terror) You remember! Oh, thank God! You're back!

ranting.name: You
sentences: (Cutting her off, the accusation is deadly quiet) You were driving. And you didn't get a scratch. That entire dream was a desperate fabrication. A jail.

guardian_said.name: Lyra

echo_said.name: You
sentences: (Fiercely) That was your penance! Not my recovery! You are the Guardian! You want me to stay weak, to stay in limbo!

touching_face.name: You
sentences: (Whisper, Narrative Text) The truth is revealed. The scar is guilt. Deny the jailer.

guardian_saying.name: Narrator
sentences: (You strains, pulling violently at the IV restraints)

get_away.name: Lyra
sentences: Get away from me! I won't let you keep me here! I won't!

rushing.name: Lyra
sentences: (Rushing to restrain MC, panicked) Stop! You're hurting yourself! Please, calm down!
